Posts.Content: Nov 7, 2008 01:56PM volzlin wrote: Sheri- I feel your pain.  Waiting is awful.  I had IDC two years ago.  Six weeks ago I got bronchitis/pneumonia.  The first chest  xray found something in my lung that was not there two years ago, possibly cancer.  The next xray was not conclusive.  The third xray found a spot on my spine, and they can not rule out cancer.  My head is spinning again!   Yesterday I had a CT and full body bone scan.  I don't know if I want the results or not.  Last Friday I had a biopsy of my uterus. Still waiting for those results.  I feel like yelling "Does anyone else want a piece of me?!!!"   You are in my prayers.   Linda
Posts.Title: Oldie, but waiting again SheriH SheriH
